attributes.action: stand by their commitment to community interest companies.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Community Interest Companies were supposed to be the way forward for social enterprises. 

A CIC is a new type of company, designed for social enterprises that want to use their profits and assets for the public good. CICs will be easy to set up, with all the flexibility and certainty of the company form, but with some special features to ensure they are working for the benefit of the community.

According to the government they would be a more attractive proposition for funders but even the government itself does not fund them.
